snippet.title: Gigantic: Rampage Edition Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Get ready to join the battle with Gigantic: Rampage Edition! Available now on PC, PS5, Xbox Series X|S, PS4, and Xbox One. Dive into thrilling 5v5 battles with 25 unique heroes, each with upgradeable abilities.

🎮 Grab your copy now at 20% off until April 16!
🔥 No microtransactions - unlock all content through gameplay!
🌟 New features include crossplay support, new heroes, maps, and more!
🆓 Enjoy free post-launch updates with Ranked Mode and hero skins!

gogigantic.com

GIGANTIC: RAMPAGE EDITION is a premium and definitive release of the original 5v5 MOBA Hero Shooter, GIGANTIC, that provides a dynamic and exciting team-based multiplayer experience for fans of both genres. Choose from a diverse roster of unique heroes, each with a set of upgradeable abilities, and team up with four other players to control objectives and take down the opposing team’s mighty Guardian, all while protecting your own. GIGANTIC: RAMPAGE EDITION available now on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox! Team Up. GO GIGANTIC!
